column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: owner. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> .@prefix : <http://www.example.com#> .:Owner a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Owner" ;    rdfs:comment "Individual who owns property" .:hasOwnership a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has ownership" ;    rdfs:comment "A relation that connects an owner to the object they own" ;    rdfs:domain :Owner ;    rdfs:range :Property .:Property a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Property" ;    rdfs:comment "Owning properties like vehicle, home, land, etc" .:Vehicle a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Property ;    rdfs:label "Vehicle" ;    rdfs:comment "A vehicle that can be owned" .:Home a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Property ;    rdfs:label "Home" ;    rdfs:comment "A home that can be owned" .:Land a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf :Property ;    rdfs:label "Land" ;    rdfs:comment "A piece of Land that can be owned" .```
